text.desc: From afar, it looks like a golden monkey head, so it is called "Herbal Head Mushroom", which is a traditional Chinese dish. It is called "mountain monkey head, seafood bird's nest".

Also known as Pleurotus ostreatus, it is a very common gray edible mushroom. The proteoglycan in Pleurotus ostreatus has a strong inhibitory effect on cancer cells and can enhance the body's immune function.
Also known as the mushroom, it is an edible fungus. The portion that is generally eaten is a mushroom fruiting body. Dried fresh mushrooms are widely used in Chinese cuisine.
It is a general term for fungi such as Boletus and Pine Tower Boletus, and most varieties are edible. There are mainly white, yellow and black boletus.
The shape is umbrella-shaped for medicinal purposes.
Also known as the white fungus has the "crown in the mushroom" reputation.
Mainly grown in China and Japan. It is an important edible fungus and can also be used medicinally.
The scientific name of Tricholoma matsutake, with its unique rich flavor, is a rare and precious natural medicinal mushroom in the world and belongs to China's endangered protected species.
Commonly known as the European Angel of Destruction, it is a deadly poisonous mushroom.
Also known as the poisonous amanita, the surface is bright red or orange-red, and there are white or slightly yellow granular scales, which is a fungus containing neurotoxicity.
Also known as leopard spotted amanita. The cap is taupe to tan and has white scales. Very poisonous.
The alias goose egg yolk is a very precious edible fungus with beautiful color and rich nutrition.
